purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Elemental geometric shape, ISO/TS 10303-1004;
items within the scope of application module Non feature shape element, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1706;
items within the scope of application module Part view definition, ISO/TS 10303-1023;
items within the scope of application module Requirement assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1233;
items within the scope of application module Shape parameters, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1743.
